welcome_message_body: Welcome to Monza, Italy! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's charming historic center, stunning parks, and the famous Monza Cathedral. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Monza has to offer during your stay!

restaurants.name: Ristorante Il Moro
restaurants.description: Ristorante Il Moro is a seafood restaurant located in Monza.
restaurants.address: Via Gian Francesco Parravicini 44 (via cavallotti), 20900 Monza Monza e Brianza

restaurants.name: Milani Caffe' & Caffe'
restaurants.description: Milani Caffe' & Caffe' is a café located in Monza.
restaurants.address: Via Passerini 3, 20900 Monza Monza e Brianza

restaurants.name: Speedy
restaurants.description: Speedy is a sandwich spot located in Monza.

restaurants.name: Carrobiolo Brewpub
restaurants.description: Carrobiolo Brewpub is a gastropub located in Monza.

restaurants.name: La Pentola Vegana
restaurants.description: La Pentola Vegana is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Monza.
restaurants.address: Via Lecco 18, 20900 Monza Monza e Brianza

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linate Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network by selecting 'LINATE_FREE_WIFI' and following the prompts.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Bergamo - Orio al Serio Airport, mainly used by low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Milano Malpensa Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, but it may be slow during peak hours.
